duties_responsibilities.duty: Build a book of residual income through B2B sales efforts.
Prioritize opportunities and manage multiple touchpoints to drive outcomes.
Conduct face-to-face networking and critical business discussions to solve business owners' problems.
Maintain client relationships for future revenue growth.
Utilize compelling communication skills to bring concepts to life and maintain a position at the top of the sales leaderboard.
Utilize a custom CRM platform for client acquisition.
Participate in training and continual improvement in sales and publishing.
Focus on renewal processes that result in higher revenue.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Sales, Marketing, or a related field (Master's preferred)
